summary: i’ve seen someone talking about this scene in the anime, how Bakugou was clearly having a panic attack, but i almost feel like...
body:
i’ve seen someone talking about this scene in the anime, how Bakugou was clearly having a panic attack, but i almost feel like his panic attack was more obvious in the manga?? especially in the second panel

i feel like it’s when an athlete has been hyped up to be the best there is, and then they lose after a huge win streak, and they’re like “?????”

bakugou thought he was the best, and deku was the worst, and then deku beat him. that’s just tough

blog.name: shotossneeze
blog.title: Another BNHA Blog
blog.description: Made mainly because I'm too invested in the Bnha theories and I couldn't take it anymore

summary: I'm sorry, but I also have to talk about these panels. I know Shoto is adorable (and he deserved this head pat for his entire...
body:
I’m sorry, but I also have to talk about these panels. I know Shoto is adorable (and he deserved this head pat for his entire life), and Bakugo still hates people touching him, but I’ve only seen a few people mentioning All Might

I felt for All Might during this scene. When he tried to save that women and Bakugo flew over, I can just imagine the helplessness he might have felt. I know he probably got over his form and his general inability to do hero work, but this is the first time (to my knowledge) that he was actually in a scene trying to save someone again since he turned skeleton, and I feel like that’s important

Look at his expression. It’s a little too depressed for someone who’s praising young ones. And you see how he’s shaded while Bakugo and Todoroki aren’t?

reblog.comment:

I know he probably got over his form and his general inability to do hero work, but this is the first time (to my knowledge) that he was actually in a scene trying to save someone again since he turned skeleton, and I feel like that’s important

Look at his expression. It’s a little too depressed for someone who’s praising young ones. And you see how he’s shaded while Bakugo and Todoroki aren’t?

trail.content_raw:
I’m sorry, but I also have to talk about these panels. I know Shoto is adorable (and he deserved this head pat for his entire life), and Bakugo still hates people touching him, but I’ve only seen a few people mentioning All Might

I felt for All Might during this scene. When he tried to save that women and Bakugo flew over, I can just imagine the helplessness he might have felt. I know he probably got over his form and his general inability to do hero work, but this is the first time (to my knowledge) that he was actually in a scene trying to save someone again since he turned skeleton, and I feel like that’s important

Look at his expression. It’s a little too depressed for someone who’s praising young ones. And you see how he’s shaded while Bakugo and Todoroki aren’t?
trail.content:
I’m sorry, but I also have to talk about these panels. I know Shoto is adorable (and he deserved this head pat for his entire life), and Bakugo still hates people touching him, but I’ve only seen a few people mentioning All Might

I felt for All Might during this scene. When he tried to save that women and Bakugo flew over, I can just imagine the helplessness he might have felt. I know he probably got over his form and his general inability to do hero work, but this is the first time (to my knowledge) that he was actually in a scene trying to save someone again since he turned skeleton, and I feel like that’s important

Look at his expression. It’s a little too depressed for someone who’s praising young ones. And you see how he’s shaded while Bakugo and Todoroki aren’t?

blog.name: everythingallmight

blog.description: A blog dedicated to the #1 Dad!

summary: WE WERE BLESSED WITH ALL MIGHT CONTENT ON THIS DAY.  I’m so glad that he’s still out there being a hero, he may have lost his...
caption:
WE WERE BLESSED WITH ALL MIGHT CONTENT ON THIS DAY. 

I’m so glad that he’s still out there being a hero, he may have lost his Quirk but he’ll never lose that drive to save people. People are still underestimating him too. He might be skinny and Quirkless but the man has decades of combat experience under his belt! Not to mention his reflexes are WAY above average as we saw in that one chapter where he caught that training ball thing like it was no trouble at all.

Not to mention his reflexes are WAY above average as we saw in that one chapter where he caught that training ball thing like it was no trouble at all.
